value:
$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|$w0|$EFace_Smile|Now, which of my precious Heroes
will I play with next?$k$p$EFace|Ah, Ephraim and Eirika... Always
so close. How lucky for you.$k$pI suppose you think that your family
bonds can survive anything. Let's
put that to the test.$k$pAs you know, I possess you fully
by contract, and so...$k$p$WmMPID_エフラム,ch08_00_Ephraim_M_Normal,Face|$w0|We refuse, whatever it is.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|$w0|How cute. My little toy is throwing
a tantrum! But you know you're
powerless to defy me.$k$pIf you don't do what I ask of you,
I'll force you to put Eirika to
death.$k$p$WmMPID_エフラム,ch08_00_Ephraim_M_Normal,Face|$w0|...$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|$w0|$EFace_Smile|But if you obey my next order like
a good toy soldier, I'll set you and
your sister free.$k$p$WmMPID_エフラム,ch08_00_Ephraim_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Very well. What is it that you demand,
to test our family bonds?$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Love is small and frail. Prove me
wrong. Show me that your love
is bold and unbreakable.$k$pThen I'll release you two from
my contract.$k$p$WmMPID_エフラム,ch08_00_Ephraim_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Simple enough.$k$p$WmMPID_エイリーク,ch08_01_Eirik_F_Normal,Face|$w0|B-Brother? What are you
planning to...$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Oh, you two. Just go figure it out.
Now, as for my other toys here...$k$p$EFace_Pain|Hmm? It seems that someone's
come to interrupt us. Go take care
of that, will you?$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Why can't I ever get what I want?
All of you, fall back and escape
through that gateway!$k$pThere's no need to fight for me
until the bitter end. Then I'd
be all alone again...$k$p

$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|$w0|It's all so lost on me...sisters and
brothers...families... All of it's
so...$k$p$WmMEID_ブルーノ,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Hello, Veronica.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|$w0|$EFace_Smile|Oh, welcome back. Where did
you disappear to?$k$p$WmMEID_ブルーノ,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|$w0|I'm looking for something. And I'm
afraid that I've got to be leaving
again soon.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Oh, you! How tedious.$k$p$EFace_Smile|Well, as long as I have you, how
about we have a tea party? I've got
a fresh pot right here.$k$p$WmMEID_ブルーノ,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|$w0|$EFace_Smile|A cup of tea would be nice. Please,
just one though.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|$w0|$EFace_Smile|Here you go. Is it good? Too hot?
Too weak?$k$p$WmMEID_ブルーノ,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|$w0|$EFace_Smile|It's perfect. Thank you, Veronica.
Now, may I ask, have you recently...$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Have I what?$k$p$WmMEID_ブルーノ,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Have you felt odd lately? Like you
were being controlled...by someone
else?$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|$w0|$EFace_Pain|Odd? What do you mean, odd?
I don't know. I don't think so?$k$p$WmMEID_ブルーノ,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Hmm. Good.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Though now that you mention it,
I do sometimes hear a voice.$k$p$WmMEID_ブルーノ,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|$w0|A voice, you say?$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Mmm-hmm. It says...kill. And
then I want to.$k$p$WmMEID_ブルーノ,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|$w0|...$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|$w0|$EFace_Smile|Now, won't you stay for another
cup of tea? Pretty please?$k$Sbs150|
